text:
I've built and used two versions mod_webapp (both versions, from the 4.01
download site and the nightly-release site).  In both cases, the web server
sometimes can get to the webapp, othertimes it spits out a 404 error.  By
clicking on the url http://<server_name>/examples/jsp, which is the default
example webapp that's packaged with Tomcat 4.01, I'll get a 404 error or the JSP
examples.  If I click on a JSP example, it'll work sometimes or spit out a 404
error.  The behavior appears to be random - works on and off, off and on.

I'm also forwarding the exception:
